      static class  ResetPassword.Request

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public SimpleResult<java.lang.Long,com.google.common.collect.Multimap> execute()

        Override of the interface Command execute method. Calls the validateRequest method that will handle all constraint checking and validations.

        If validation passes, it will update and persist the class User object. It will then return a class SimpleResult object with the class User id and a null errors field.

        If validation fails, it will return a class SimpleResult with the errors and a null success field

        See Also:
        interface Command, class User, class SimpleResult, class User, class SimpleResult
